ImagerJs

A JavaScript library for uploading images using drag & drop. Crop, rotate, resize, or shrink your image before uploading.

View the Project on GitHub

Images Editor

ImagerJs is a platform-independent, web-based JavaScript Image Uploader with Editing that is very easy to use.

Show Images Editing Demo

What is ImagerJs? How can I use it?

Here you will find more informations about features and a short faq: ImagerJs

Here you will find a detailed documentation about the usage and its configuration: ImagerJs-Docs
